title: crashed after a while for  2.49.0
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2.49.0-stable-034ef638

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 034ef638

Erigon Command (with flags/config): erigon --datadir /eth-erigon --chain mainnet --rpc.batch.limit 100000 --rpc.returndata.limit 10000000 --rpc.batch.concurrency 100000 --bodies.cache 65536M --state.cache 16384M

Concensus Layer: prysm-v4.0.8

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): beacon-chain --datadir /beacon-prysm --mainnet

Chain/Network: ethereum mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
normal running

#### Actual behaviour
every time it crashes after running a while

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace

````
[INFO] [09-08|03:33:57.233] [NewPayload] Handling new payload        height=18089047 hash=0xbac5521b3a006a227ce0046f8a5b12cd93409910ff9c50fc3742b869428e91e2
[INFO] [09-08|03:34:00.272] [NewPayload] Handling new payload        height=18089048 hash=0xd8cd7d569426fc6a8aae555ec7745aee085268cf3821adbe668ff83838d34fed
[EROR] [09-08|03:34:00.768] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDBX_MAP_FULL: Environment mapsize limit reached"
[INFO] [09-08|03:34:01.387] [EngineBlockDownloader] Downloading block bodies block_num=18088908 delivery/sec=367.4KB wasted/sec=0B remaining=110 delivered=79 cache=4.2MB alloc=3.3GB sys=5.2GB
[INFO] [09-08|03:34:12.242] [NewPayload] Handling new payload        height=18089049 hash=0x9502e4a98210305c2cafc7f2f8bcc86cb814851704d5c59c22c5868dbfa0b720
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x0 pc=0x14e9507]

goroutine 7417 [running]:
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.(*TxPool).flushLocked(0xc0b0e09400, {0x2dbe3c0?, 0xc064e26120})
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230906031217-cb36bf043c5c/txpool/pool.go:1614 +0xa7
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.(*TxPool).flush.func1({0x2dbe3c0?, 0xc064e26120})
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230906031217-cb36bf043c5c/txpool/pool.go:1598 +0x4b
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/kv/mdbx.(*MdbxKV).Update(0x5000501010000?, {0x2d93860?, 0xc001128460?}, 0xc0bcbb6c40)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230906031217-cb36bf043c5c/kv/mdbx/kv_mdbx.go:670 +0xb6
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.(*TxPool).flush(0xc0b0e09400, {0x2d93860, 0xc001128460}, {0x2da5518, 0xc098fa5a00})
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230906031217-cb36bf043c5c/txpool/pool.go:1597 +0x21f
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.MainLoop({0x2d93860?, 0xc001128460}, {0x2da5518, 0xc098fa5a00}, {0x0?, 0x0?}, 0xc0b0e09400, 0xc0b23304e0, 0xc0b232e7d0, 0xc0b0e6c4c8, ...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230906031217-cb36bf043c5c/txpool/pool.go:1483 +0x36a
created by github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth.New
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/backend.go:656 +0x3ff1

````

Erigon version: 2.49.0-stable
OS & Version: Linux
Polygon archive mainnet
Chaindata size: 7.3T

``` 
 --db.pagesize=8kb \
 --db.size.limit=10TB \
```
```
[INFO] [09-08|10:33:41.135] Opening Database                         label=chaindata path=/home/blockchain/polygon-mainnet/chaindata/chaindata mdbx_setup_dxb:15897 could not apply preconfigured db-geometry: err -30417
[EROR] [09-08|10:33:41.137] Erigon startup                           err="mdbx_env_open: MDBX_TOO_LARGE: Database is too large for current system, e.g. could NOT be mapped into RAM, label: chaindata, trace: [kv_mdbx.go:263 node.go:342 node.go:345 backend.go:224 node.go:111 main.go:71 make_app.go:42 command.go:274 app.go:332 app.go:309 main.go:38 proc.go:250 asm_amd64.s:1594]"
mdbx_env_open: MDBX_TOO_LARGE: Database is too large for current system, e.g. could NOT be mapped into RAM, label: chaindata, trace: [kv_mdbx.go:263 node.go:342 node.go:345 backend.go:224 node.go:111 main.go:71 make_app.go:42 command.go:274 app.go:332 app.go:309 main.go:38 proc.go:250 asm_amd64.s:1594]
```
Available 490G of RAM

```
mdbx_stat v0.12.0-71-g1cac6536 (2022-07-28T09:57:31+07:00, T-9a6d7e5b917e5fbd14dc51835fa749d092aa1d72)
Running for chaindata/chaindata...
Environment Info
  Pagesize: 4096
  Dynamic datafile: 24576..8796093022208 bytes (+2147483648/-4294967296), 6..2147483648 pages (+524288/-1048576)
  Current mapsize: 8796093022208 bytes, 2147483648 pages 
  Current datafile: 7101728423936 bytes, 1733820416 pages
  Last transaction ID: 96627572
  Latter reader transaction ID: 96627572 (0)
  Max readers: 116
  Number of reader slots uses: 1
Garbage Collection
  Pagesize: 4096
  Tree depth: 2
  Branch pages: 1
  Leaf pages: 2
  Overflow pages: 94
  Entries: 112
Page Usage
  Total: 2147483648 100%
  Backed: 1733820416 80.7%
  Allocated: 1733656549 80.7%
  Remained: 413827099 19.3%
  Used: 1733561728 80.7%
  GC: 94821 0.0%
  Retained: 27 0.0%
  Reclaimable: 94794 0.0%

Status of Main DB
  Pagesize: 4096
  Tree depth: 2
  Branch pages: 1
  Leaf pages: 3
  Overflow pages: 0
  Entries: 112
```
When I come back to 2.48.1, it runs ok now.

Your pagesize is Pagesize: 4096
Only way to change it: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/blob/devel/cmd/integration/Readme.md#copy-data-to-another-db

> Your pagesize is Pagesize: 4096 Only way to change it: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/blob/devel/cmd/integration/Readme.md#copy-data-to-another-db

I have done this, and now when I tried to start erigon, it reported the following error:
```log
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.745] logging to file system                   log dir=/eth-erigon/logs file prefix=erigon log level=info json=false
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.747] Build info                               git_branch=HEAD git_tag=v2.49.2 git_commit=1b54c31c7178cef0553e05fc810f810318e04385
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.747] Starting Erigon on Ethereum mainnet... 
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.753] Maximum peer count                       ETH=200 total=200
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.753] starting HTTP APIs                       APIs=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,shh
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.754] torrent verbosity                        level=WRN
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.755] [torrent] Public IP                      ip=21.21.21.21
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.760] Set global gas cap                       cap=50000000
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.908] [Downloader] Runnning with               ipv6-enabled=true ipv4-enabled=true download.rate=16mb upload.rate=4mb
[INFO] [09-20|09:54:08.909] Opening Database                         label=chaindata path=/home/eth/eth-erigon/chaindata
runtime: goroutine stack exceeds 1000000000-byte limit
runtime: sp=0xc036580328 stack=[0xc036580000, 0xc056580000]
fatal error: stack overflow

runtime stack:
runtime.throw({0x25bab3a?, 0x41bbd80?})
	runtime/panic.go:1047 +0x5d fp=0x7fc20cff8c20 sp=0x7fc20cff8bf0 pc=0x467bfd
runtime.newstack()
	runtime/stack.go:1105 +0x5bd fp=0x7fc20cff8dd0 sp=0x7fc20cff8c20 pc=0x48261d
runtime.morestack()
	runtime/asm_amd64.s:574 +0x8b fp=0x7fc20cff8dd8 sp=0x7fc20cff8dd0 pc=0x49d0eb

goroutine 1 [running]:
runtime.newobject(0x2282f00?)
	runtime/malloc.go:1253 +0x3b fp=0xc036580338 sp=0xc036580330 pc=0x43ca9b
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/compress.newPatternTable(...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230915052220-297d9e7d1304/compress/decompress.go:48
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/compress.buildCondensedPatternTable(0xc06aa381e0, {0xc001f03938?, 0x2b259, 0x350d9}, {0xc00358cba8?, 0x2b259, 0x2ea2e}, 0x0, 0x9, 0x28118a, ...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230915052220-297d9e7d1304/compress/decompress.go:282 +0xb6 fp=0xc0365803f0 sp=0xc036580338 pc=0x1015636
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/compress.buildCondensedPatternTable(0xc06aa381e0, {0xc001f03938?, 0x2b259, 0x350d9}, {0xc00358cba8?, 0x2b259, 0x2ea2e}, 0x0, 0x8, 0x281189, ...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230915052220-297d9e7d1304/compress/decompress.go:286 +0x2b0 fp=0xc0365804a8 sp=0xc0365803f0 pc=0x1015830
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/compress.buildCondensedPatternTable(0xc06aa381e0, {0xc001f03938?, 0x2b259, 0x350d9}, {0xc00358cba8?, 0x2b259, 0x2ea2e}, 0x0, 0x7, 0x281188, ...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230915052220-297d9e7d1304/compress/decompress.go:286 +0x2b0 fp=0xc036580560 sp=0xc0365804a8 pc=0x1015830
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/compress.buildCondensedPatternTable(0xc06aa381e0, {0xc001f03938?, 0x2b259, 0x350d9}, {0xc00358cba8?, 0x2b259, 0x2ea2e}, 0x0, 0x6, 0x281187, ...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230915052220-297d9e7d1304/compress/decompress.go:286 +0x2b0 fp=0xc036580618 sp=0xc036580560 pc=0x1015830

```

How is it possible that I've been running this archival node for months with flag -db.pagesize=16kb, after upgrading and running into issues left and right, checked mdbx_stat -ef datadir/chaindata and the page size is 4096? I swear this is a shakeout.
